Auckland bus attack: driver told he was a servant, abused and punched on Avondale route in racially charged attack, suspect at large https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-bus-attack-driver-told-he-was-a-servant-abused-and-punched-on-avondale-route-in-racially-charged-攻击嫌疑人在逃/HMKLUUXY5JEW3C2MBQXVQJQUFY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-bus-attack-driver-told-he-was-a-servant-abused-and-punched-on-avondale-route-in-racially-charged-攻击嫌疑人在逃/HMKLUUXY5JEW3C2MBQXVQJQUFY/ George BlockA man told the driver to go back to India, later unleashing a vicious assault.
